description: This file is an ESLint configuration script tailored for a project using Svelte, TypeScript, and JavaScript. It combines various recommended settings, specifies file-specific overrides, and sets global variables for linting.

methods.name: ts.config
methods.description: Generates ESLint configuration using TypeScript plugin settings and overrides.

methods.name: includeIgnoreFile
methods.description: Includes files to be ignored based on a .gitignore file.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a filesystem path.
